version_description:
- Maria Selva has been spotted wearing an edgy new outfit!
- New Fauna artifacts have been added to Blazing Sands with an exclusive hat reward
- Compete in new Global Challenges for exclusive prizes
- Bug fixes

What will you find lurking in the Lost Jungle?

The gang has discovered a decrepit temple deep in the lush forest of the Lost Jungle.  Climb high into the canopy, race through the overgrown ruins, delve deep into the dark caverns, and stay on high alert; the Demon Monkey isn’t the only thing hiding in the Lost Jungle…

- NEW RUNNERS! Explorers Rahi Raaja and Nidhi Nirmal enter the Lost Jungle hoping to find exciting new treasure…
- New artifact set! Lost Jungle Manuscripts
- Compete in new Global Challenges for exclusive prizes!

- Collect Tokens to unlock the new ‘Regal’ outfits for Rahi Raaja and Nidhi Nirmal!
- New Totem artifacts have been added to the Lost Jungle with an exclusive hat reward!
- Treasure Chests spawn more frequently!
- Compete in new Global Challenges for exclusive prizes!
- Minor Bug Fixes.
- The Demon Monkey has been finding a new hiding place for the idol while we've been busy squashing bugs.
- The Demon Monkey has been finding a new hiding place for the idol while we've been busy squashing bugs.

The leaves are beginning to change in the Lost Jungle!
- Introducing the Fall Jungle map for a limited time
- Collect Fall Coins for a limited time as you take in the new scenery
- Compete in Fall Jungle-themed Global Challenges

The leaves are beginning to change in the Lost Jungle!
- Introducing the Fall Jungle map for a limited time
- Collect Fall Coins for a limited time as you take in the new scenery
- Compete in Fall Jungle-themed Global Challenges

The leaves have changed in the Lost Jungle!
- Race through the Fall Jungle map for a limited time
- Choose your favorite coins to collect with the new coin skin menu
- Compete in Fall-themed Global Challenges

The leaves have changed in the Lost Jungle!
- Race through the Fall Jungle map for a limited time
- Choose your favorite coins to collect with the new coin skin menu
- Compete in Fall-themed Global Challenges

Halloween has taken over Temple Run 2!
- Escape the Ghostly Demon Monkey in the return of Spooky Summit
- Unlock Halloween-themed characters, costumes, hats, and MORE
- Compete in Halloween themed Global Challenges to unlock spooky rewards

- Collect Thanksgiving Pie Coins for a limited time
- Last chance to explore the Fall Jungle Map before Winter arrives!
- Bug Fixes

- Collect Thanksgiving Pie Coins for a limited time
- Last chance to explore the Fall Jungle Map before Winter arrives!
- Added support for iPhone X

Welcome to the Frozen Festival!
- Lights, presents, snowmen and more
- New zones - Ice Caves and Frozen Cliffs
- Introducing two new costumes - Forester Freya and Lumberjack Sigur
- New cookie coin skin

Happy 5th Anniversary to Temple Run 2!
- New Anniversary artifacts with an exclusive Party hat
- New Global Challenge reward - 'Showtime' Zack Wonder outfit
- New Anniversary Cake coin skin
- New objectives to take you to even higher levels!
- Introducing ’Daily Quests’ - all new challenges to amass new riches

Happy 5th Anniversary to Temple Run 2!
- New Anniversary artifacts with an exclusive Party hat
- New Global Challenge reward - 'Showtime' Zack Wonder outfit
- New Anniversary Cake coin skin
- New objectives to take you to even higher levels!
- Introducing ’Daily Quests’ - all new challenges to amass new riches

Happy 5th Anniversary to Temple Run 2!
- New Anniversary artifacts with an exclusive Party hat
- New Global Challenge reward - 'Showtime' Zack Wonder outfit
- New Anniversary Cake coin skin
- New objectives to take you to even higher levels!
- Introducing ’Daily Quests’ - all new challenges to amass new riches

Valentine's is BACK!
- Dress to impress with the Romeo outfit for Zack Wonder
- Unlock the Valentine Hat by collecting lovey dovey artifacts
- Collect as many hearts as you can - with the Valentine coin skin!

Welcome to the Lost Jungle - Lantern Festival!
- Get lost in the lights and explore the Lantern Festival
- Unlock the Dragon Dancer outfit for Karma Lee
- Fill your belly - with the new Dim Sum coins!

- Rotating Seasonal Content
- Minor Bug Fixes

- Daily Quest Update!
- Rotating Seasonal Content
- Minor Bug Fixes

Unlock the mysteries of the Pirate Cove, where more than ancient treasure awaits those brave enough to tread its waters.

Join the crew in exploring Pirate Cove!
- Get your hands on long lost treasures with exclusive new Pirate Coins!
- Explore the ruins with exclusive new outfits, Magnum Guy and Castaway Francisco!
- Create your legend by collecting new artifacts to unlock special hats!

Unlock the mysteries of the Pirate Cove, where more than ancient treasure awaits those brave enough to tread its waters.

Join the crew in exploring Pirate Cove!
- Get your hands on long lost treasures with exclusive new Pirate Coins!
- Explore the ruins with exclusive new outfits, Magnum Guy and Castaway Francisco!
- Create your legend by collecting new artifacts to unlock special hats!

Unlock the mysteries of the Pirate Cove, where more than ancient treasure awaits those brave enough to tread its waters.

- Join the crew in exploring Pirate Cove!
- Get your hands on long lost treasures with exclusive new Pirate Coins!
- Explore the ruins with exclusive new outfits, Magnum Guy and Castaway Francisco!
- Create your legend by collecting new artifacts to unlock special hats!

Experience a Holiday like no other in our biggest update of the year! Holiday Havoc is upon us and Santa and Mrs. Claus need your help! Save the day by sprinting, jumping, sliding your way through a snowy volcano, holiday decor, volcanic royalty, and… dragons?!

Here’s what’s been added in Holiday Havoc:
- Limited-time Holiday Havoc Map: Snowy volcanos and much more!
- 2 New Characters: Frozen King Fafnir and Frozen Queen Astrid
- 2 Hot New Outfits: Volcanic Santa & Mrs Claus
- Exclusive Winter Mitten Coin Set
- Month-long festive Community Events

Experience a Holiday like no other in our biggest update of the year! Holiday Havoc is upon us and Santa and Mrs. Claus need your help! Save the day by sprinting, jumping, sliding your way through a snowy volcano, holiday decor, volcanic royalty, and… dragons?!

Here’s what’s been added in Holiday Havoc:
- Limited-time Holiday Havoc Map: Snowy volcanos and much more!
- 2 New Characters: Frozen King Fafnir and Frozen Queen Astrid
- 2 Hot New Outfits: Volcanic Santa & Mrs Claus
- Exclusive Winter Mitten Coin Set
- Month-long festive Community Events

Burst into Blooming Sands as the world takes on new life! But watch out, there's more than just the Demon Monkey out to get you.
-Gather coins and collect artifacts in a world filled with flowers.
-Barry Bones and Maria Selva are ready take the Idol, as they're 50% off from July 5th to July 12th.

Unlock the mysteries of the Pirate Cove, where more than ancient treasure awaits those brave enough to tread its waters.

- Join the crew in exploring Pirate Cove!
- Get your hands on long lost treasures with exclusive new Pirate Coins!
- Explore the ruins with exclusive new outfits, Magnum Guy and Castaway Francisco!
- Create your legend by collecting new artifacts to unlock special hats!

The Fall Jungle beckons only the bravest! Are you ready for what waits in a land lost to time?
- For a limited time, run through a jungle transformed by Autumn.
- Test your skills with fall themed Global Challenges.
- Choose your favorite coin skins to collect with fall leaves coins!
Bug Fixes and Improvements
Bug Fixes and Improvements

Explosions of colors are all around for the Holi Festival! Run, jump, and glide your way down the five joyous colors of the glistening river!
Make a splash in our most colorful map ever, the Holi Festival!

Paint the temple with our new color challenges and more!
This world is best explored with characters Rahi and Nidhi.
Try to run on as many colors as you can!

Love is in the air for our runners in Winter Wasteland! Warm your heart with treasures by collecting coins and artifacts!

- Thanks to Stevie Ramsey and Sonny Leko for naming the new map, "Winter Wasteland" via official TR Facebook!
- Runner, Romeo Zack, makes a return for Valentine's, the love run reward!

The beauty of the marigold is spreading across the Cove. Begin a celebration that will wake the dead in this all new adventure!

- Explore the alluring new Spirits Cove map
- Unlock festive new outfits
- Collect the decorative Spirits Cove Skull Artifacts
- Return of the Spooky Summit map
- Halloween characters & outfits have returned for a limited time

- Return of the Spooky Summit map
- Halloween characters & outfits have returned for a limited time

A deep and snowy winter has arrived! Brave the cold with the return of special events and characters in Temple Run 2.

-For a limited time, we welcome the return of our Frozen Festival.
-Global Challenges are here with a holiday twist!
-Spread the cheer with special holiday Artifacts and Characters!

- For a limited time, run through a jungle transformed by Autumn.

- Choose your favorite coin skins to collect with fall leaves coins!

Trick or treat. This new update is spooky good! Temple Run 2 is bringing the season’s Halloween fun to you with Spooky Ridge!
- Explore the alluring new Spooky Ridge map.
- Halloween characters & outfits have returned for a limited time.
- Meet the new Ghosts you’ll see hovering around Spooky Ridge.
- Have a sweet tooth? Pick up candy corn by changing your coin’s skin. Yummy!

Experience a Holiday like no other in our biggest update of the year! Holiday Havoc is upon us and Santa and Mrs. Claus need your help! Save the day by sprinting, jumping, sliding your way through a snowy volcano, holiday decor, volcanic royalty, and… dragons?!

- Month-long festive Community Events

The hottest release of the year! Grab your favorite runner and race through the lava flows of Volcano Island! Runner beware - new dangers lurk around every turn!

What’s NEW in Volcano Island:

Volcano Island Map: New obstacles, music and more!

2 New Characters: King Fafnir and Queen Astrid

3 New Artifact Sets w/ Hats!

New Volcanic Coins!

New Global Challenges with awesome rewards!

Love is in the air for our runners in Winter Wasteland! Warm your heart with treasures by collecting heart-shaped coins and Valentine’s themed artifacts!

+Runner, Showtime Zack Wonder, makes a special appearance for a limited time
+Heart-shaped feature coin skin
+Upgraded Valentine’s artifact set
+Valentine’s themed Winter Wasteland limited feature map

Explosions of colors are all around for the Holi Festival! Run, jump, and glide your way down the five joyous colors of the glistening river!

+Make a splash in our most colorful map ever, the Holi Festival!
+Paint the temple with our new color challenges and more!
+This world is best explored with characters Rahi and Nidhi.
+Try to run on as many colors as you can!

+Make a splash in our most colorful map ever, the Holi Festival!
+Paint the temple with our new color challenges and more!
+This world is best explored with characters Rahi and Nidhi.
+Try to run on as many colors as you can!

Pirate Cove is covered with litter and only runners like yourself can clean it up! It's time to go green and help make the world of Temple Run a safer and healthier place!

+Pirate Cove is piled with refuse in our brand new Earth Day Map!
+Take our brand new runner, Joshua Woods, out on the beaches to get the cleanup started!
+Celebrate Earth Day by collecting two brand new artifacts sets and three three new hats!
+Collect litter while you run and work together as a community to restore Pirate Cove to its former beauty!

Burst into Blooming Sands as the world takes on new life! But watch out, there's more than just the Demon Monkey out to get you.

+Blooming Sands Map returns for a limited time
+Gather coins and collect artifacts in a new lush environment
+'Outrider' Barry Bones and ‘Shadow Walker’ Karma Lee make a special return

Burst into Blooming Sands as the world takes on new life! But watch out, there's more than just the Demon Monkey out to get you.

+Blooming Sands Map returns for a limited time
+Gather coins and collect artifacts in a new lush environment
+'Outrider' Barry Bones and ‘Shadow Walker’ Karma Lee make a special return

What will you find lurking in the Lost Jungle?

The gang has discovered a decrepit temple deep in the lush forest of the Lost Jungle. Climb high into the canopy, race through the overgrown ruins, delve deep into the dark caverns, and stay on high alert; the Demon Monkey isn’t the only thing hiding in the Lost Jungle…
One of the hottest releases of the year! Grab your favorite runner and race through the lava flows of Volcano Island! Runner beware - new dangers lurk around every turn!
One of the hottest releases of the year! Grab your favorite runner and race through the lava flows of Volcano Island! Runner beware - new dangers lurk around every turn!

Enter and run through the mystical walls of the Enchanted Palace with the wise old healer - Sunyu Han and her charismatic potion making apprentice - Sara Banyan. 
+Explore the charming palace gardens and collect the brand new Artifact sets.
+Beware the dangerous traps! 
+Keep Calm and Run On!

Enter and run through the mystical walls of the Enchanted Palace with the wise old healer - Sunyu Han and her charismatic potion making apprentice - Sara Banyan. 
+Explore the charming palace gardens and collect the brand new Artifact sets. 
+Beware the dangerous traps! 
+Keep Calm and Run On!

Enter and run through the mystical walls of the Enchanted Palace with the wise old healer - Sunyu Han and her charismatic potion making apprentice - Sara Banyan.
+Explore the charming palace gardens and collect the brand new Artifact sets.
+Beware the dangerous traps!
+Keep Calm and Run On!

Spooktacular Characters with Pets are coming to Temple Run 2!
+ New special-edition Pets join you on the run! Play as the new Holwin’ Wolfman with Lumi the Moon, or run as Selene the Astronaut with Comet the Alien
+ Brand new eerie soundtrack in surround sound for the featured map - Spooky Summit
+ Halloween Maps, Characters & Outfits have returned for a limited time
+ Limited edition Halloween Hats and Artifacts

The leaves are beginning to change in the Lost Jungle!
+ Introducing the Fall Jungle map for a limited time
+ Collect Fall Coins for a limited time as you take in the new scenery
+ Compete in Fall Jungle-themed Global Challenges

The leaves are beginning to change in the Lost Jungle!
+ Introducing the Fall Jungle map for a limited time
+ Collect Fall Coins for a limited time as you take in the new scenery
+ Compete in Fall Jungle-themed Global Challenges

Celebrate the holidays like never before with our magical Winter Toyland!
Explore the larger-than-life map full of gigantic toys and jumbo treats with the limited-edition tiny toy runners & brand new pets!
+ Run with Bella the Ballerina & her magical plushie - Rainbow the Unicorn
+ The Nutcracker and his friend Holly the Reindeer have come to life with an exclusive power
+ Collect brand new sets of Winter Toyland artifacts along with the unique holiday hats

Celebrate the holidays like never before with our magical Winter Toyland!
Explore the larger-than-life map full of gigantic toys and jumbo treats with the limited-edition tiny toy runners & brand new pets!
+ Run with Bella the Ballerina & her magical plushie - Rainbow the Unicorn
+ The Nutcracker and his friend Holly the Reindeer have come to life with an exclusive power
+ Collect brand new sets of Winter Toyland artifacts along with the unique holiday hats

Vikings Freya Coldheart and Sigur Frostbeard have returned to search Frozen Shadows for their lost treasures!
+ Viking characters Freya and Sigur have returned for a limited time
+ Upgrade to the new Frozen Festival map including Forester Freya and Lumberjack Sigur outfits
+ Compete in new Global Challenges for exclusive prizes

Welcome to the Lost Jungle - Lantern Festival!
Get lost in the lights and explore the Lantern Festival
+ Unlock the Dragon Dancer outfit for Karma Lee
+ Upgrade to “Golden” Guy Dangerous and Scarlett Fox
+ Fill your belly - with the Dim Sum coins!
+ Love is in the air with Nidhi Nirmal's new 'Cupid' outfit!

Pirate Cove needs your help! Only runners like you can clean it up! It's time to go green and help make the world of Temple Run a safer and healthier place!
+Pirate Cove is piled with refuse in the return of our Earth Day Map!
+Runners Maria Selva and Rahi Raja are out on the beaches to get the cleanup started!
+Celebrate Earth Day by collecting two themed artifacts sets and three hats!
+Collect litter while you run and work as a community to restore Pirate Cove to its former beauty!

Karma Lee, Barry Bones and the rest of the crew find themselves in a desolate new land, filled with treacherous obstacles and unique landscapes. Run along the ledges of a raging river, escape the grasp of the living vines, unlock new outfits, and above all, elude the Demon Monkey or become its next meal!

Karma Lee, Barry Bones and the rest of the crew find themselves in a desolate new land, filled with treacherous obstacles and unique landscapes. Run along the ledges of a raging river, escape the grasp of the living vines, unlock new outfits, and above all, elude the Demon Monkey or become its next meal!

Enchanted Palace is back with the splendour of its mystical walls and the charming palace gardens. Take Kai Xiang, a battle monk ready to explore and prove his might, across the challenges that await the dauntless runner.

+Explore the charming palace gardens and complete the Artifact sets.
+Beware the dangerous traps!
+Keep Calm and Run On!

Enchanted Palace is back with the splendour of its mystical walls and the charming palace gardens. Take Kai Xiang, a battle monk ready to explore and prove his might, across the challenges that await the dauntless runner.

+Explore the charming palace gardens and complete the Artifact sets.
+Beware the dangerous traps!
+Keep Calm and Run On!

The gang has discovered the ruins of a temple deep in the lush forest of the Lost Jungle. Climb high into the canopy, race through the overgrown ruins, delve deep into the dark caverns, and stay on high alert. The Demon Monkey isn’t the only thing hiding here…

What will you find lurking in the Lost Jungle?

We are 10!!!
Join us in celebrating these adventurous years of escaping from traps, falls and one estranged Demon Monkey

1. Earn 3 brand new hats
2. Run down memory lane with a New Guy Dangerous who's seen some exciting days
3. Expand your adventure and enjoy the thrills of two maps.

We are 10!!!
Join us in celebrating these adventurous years of escaping from traps, falls and one estranged Demon Monkey

1. Earn 3 brand new hats
2. Run down memory lane with a New Guy Dangerous who's seen some exciting days
3. Expand your adventure and enjoy the thrills of two maps.

Grab your favorite runner and race through the flowing lava of Volcano Island! Runners beware, new dangers lurk around every turn! The idol awaits the most daring of adventurers. This Anniversary brings new goodies:
- A new Guy Dangerous Outfit: Grizzled Guy and a new Queen Astrid Outfit: The Dragon Princess are here
- New Hat Giveaways
- Complete your Artifact Sets and Global Challenges for awesome rewards!

The leaves are beginning to change in the Lost Jungle, which brings a lot more adventure your way! Complete the Fall Jungle themed Challenges and take in the scenery, as this map brings you new goodies.
- New Runner Outfits: Rahi Raaja - Disco King and Nidhi Nirmal - Disco Queen are here!
- New Pet System! Equip Pets on any character now.
- Brand New look to the game - New UI system and flow!
- Engage in the new Daily Challenges experience and claim the rewards
